snippet.title: 100 doors of artifact - Room Escape Challenge
snippet.description:
Get the 100 doors of artifact - Room Escape Challenge on
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.hfg.door.room.escape.adventure.mystery.level.lock.key.hidden.cage
App store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/100-doors-of-artifacts/id1538119795                                                                                                                           

All our precious Artifacts have been looted from the museum. Those artifacts were not just a tool or a work of art, those were our ancestor's identity. Are you ready for a splendid mission to retrieve our artifacts?
Play as a Detective and walk in her shoes as you investigate the theft and bring back all the Artifacts. Use your detective skills to break the codes and open doors.
Investigate cryptic clues, unravel the case, and enjoy all the Mini games with beautifully illustrated adventures! Use your observation skills and deductive reasoning to find all the stolen Artifacts. 
It is a brand-new and unique Door escape game which will challenge and entertain your mind with logical game play for hours. 
Collect treasures and tools in your inventory, find clues, and enjoy a brilliant escape room experience from the comfort of your mobile device.
100 Doors Game is simple to play, but yet very complicated to beat! 
Get some gain for your brain and have fun! 

SPECIAL FEATURES: 
Awesome levels with cool graphics and animations.
100 Addictive Levels. 
User-friendly hints.
It’s free! No registration, no hassles, just download and play. 
Save your progress so you can play on multiple devices! 
Explore variety of themes. 
Daily gifts and rewards available. 
Game translated in 25 major languages.
Enjoyable Mini-games.
